sources.title: The Serpent King (The Python) | Full Movie | Action Adventure
sources.description:
The Serpent King - A secluded mountain village in northern Fujian is in a state of panic after a wedding party was invaded by the Python King and his giant snake. After the groom slays the beast and throws it on the alter, the python king vows to get his revenge, leaving the village in fear for their lives.
2021.  Stars: Naomen Eerdeni, Mengxuan Jiang, Eric Suen
*Licensed from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: Pei Yuan's village faces execution unless he kills a giant python falsely accused of murder within 3 days. He reluctantly leads the oppressed villagers against the brutal beast and commander.
metadata.Actors: Naomen Eerdeni, Mengxuan Jiang, Erica Muse
